data.title: From Bern to Maison Cailler, for a chocolatey experience
data.meta_description: The CHOCOLAT EXPRESS train takes you from Switzerland’s capital to the heart of the Gruyère region, to visit the emblematic Maison Cailler.
data.text:
The CHOCOLAT EXPRESS train takes you from Switzerland’s capital to the heart of the Gruyère region, home of the emblematic Maison Cailler.

Board the train in Bern for a direct journey that will take you to Broc-Chocolaterie (Maison Cailler) in just an hour and 18 minutes.

Having arrived at Maison Cailler, get ready for an immersive experience in a veritable chocolate factory. Dive into exploration of the award-winning museum.

Put your logic to the test! Try to work out the plot to the captivating escape game based on the Cailler chocolate factory.

Seize the opportunity to take part in one of the many workshops on offer, where you can create your own chocolates!

No reservations are needed for the CHOCOLATE EXPRESS and access is at no extra cost with a valid ticket.

Purchase your ticket online, on the CFF or FAIRTIQ mobile applications, or from your nearest station or a partner sales outlet.

Groups of 10 people or more must register at a public transport sales point at least 2 working days before departure.

Benefit from a 20% discount on your journey by public transport and admission to the Maison Cailler with the RailAway offer.

July 2024: 50% discount on the public transport journey.

Extend your visit by discovering the many activities, hikes and excursions with the DayPass offered by La Gruyère Tourisme.

And why not turn your visit into an unforgettable holiday with the La Gruyère Passport package tailored to your tastes?

These offers cannot be used in combination with other promotions.
